ygData.subject: Re: Hmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: random info i have... ... butchers knife identifies as Killer s knife not very helpful, and never found anyone who wanted it... ... a number of people in and
ygData.messageBody:
random info i have...

>1) The butcher knife quest. The knife is now lore/no drop so its very
butchers knife identifies as 'Killer's knife' not very helpful,
and never found anyone who wanted it...

> On a related note go to the magic hall in Ak'anon and ask Tergon 'Who is
>Meldrath?'
>
a number of people in and around akanon have things to say about meldrath
and whatever his group is called, i specifically remember the warriors
guild, but i think there were others....never got to a related quest out of
any of them tho...

>2) Non-rusted Blackbox. Very rarely when killing clockworks in Steamfont

thought i had seen a request for these at one point...but couldn't find it
again last time i found one...might try doing the warrior quest to give the
cards to the clockworks and get whatever it was...that seems like it was
related, tho been a while since i did it...

>3) Gnome in Erudin. Go to the jail cells by the bank and there's a gnome
not gotten anything useful out of him...

>4) The Great Span. This quest probably has nothing to do with tinkering
>
i would guess that the heads are wanted by the erudites, since they are
opposed to the great span, but haven't heard of any specific quests for
them...mebbe need to give the letter to some erudite? or find the erudite
assassins the guy in qeynos is afraid of?

nothing directly useful, but mebbe one of you can find more than i
did...gotten a bit disillusioned with quests since going thru and doing all
that i could find when i started(beta4/beginning of release), and finding
out that many of them would be worth doing now, but not knowing which
without digging thru spoiler sites, which would ruin the fun anyway :(

Xillitil/Povar
